Package com.example.cmput301w24t33.users

Class UserRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.cmput301w24t33.users.UserRepository
public class UserRepository extends Object
Handles data operations for Users, interacting with Firebase Firestore to perform CRUD operations on user data.

    • setUserSnapshotListener

    • setCheckedInUsersSnapshotListener

      public void setCheckedInUsersSnapshotListener(String eventId)
      Sets a snapshot listener for users checked into a specific event, reflecting real-time updates.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to listen for check-ins.

    • setSignedUpUsersSnapshotListener

      public void setSignedUpUsersSnapshotListener(String eventId)
      Sets a snapshot listener for users signed up for a specific event, reflecting real-time updates.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to listen for sign-ups.

    • getUser

      public void getUser(String userId)
      Retrieves a single user by their ID and reflects any changes in real-time.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the user to retrieve.

    • setUser

      public void setUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the Firestore database and updates their userId with the generated document ID.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object to add to Firestore.
